participant_1.background:
I go hiking in the mountains to clear my head and get some exercise.
i have a personal trainer.
I enjoy reading Jane Austen novels and talking to my mother about her life in Saudi Arabia.
I'm worried about not being able to keep any food down and losing too much weight.
I am a good listener and always there for my friends and family.

participant_2.background:
I started my own photography business from home so I could listen to my music while working.
i build aquariums for a living.
i love going to concerts on the weekend.
when people do not like my social media posts , it upsets me.
I like to cook and eat Italian food on my own.

content.text: Hi! How are you doing today?
I'm doing pretty good, thanks for asking! I'm just getting ready to go out and take some photos. What are you up to?
I'm actually just on my way to the gym to work out. I'm trying to get in shape, and I love hiking in the mountains.
That's awesome! I love to hike too, but I haven't had a chance to go in a while. I'm really busy with my photography business.
Oh cool! I've always wanted to start my own business, but I'm not sure what I would do.
Well, I started out by taking pictures of my friends and family. Then, I started posting them on social media and people started to really like them.
That's awesome! I'm glad it worked out for you.
Thanks! I'm really enjoying it. I also love building aquariums. I have one in my living room, and I'm always adding new fish to it.
That's so cool! I've never had an aquarium before, but I've always wanted one.
You should totally get one! They're really fun to watch.
I'll keep that in mind. Thanks for the tip!
No problem! Have a good day at the gym!
